deleteVariable(string,uint256,string).details: deletes the contract if the caller has the authorization (first bit starting from right).

updateMatrix(string,uint256,string,addre.details: Update an entry of the access matrix

params._activity: is the name of the activity
params._val: is a 4 bit int that allows to find if a certain matrix entry has access or not to a vraiable (read,write,create,delete) are the four bits.

updateValue(string,uint256,uint32,string.details: Update the variable value if the caller has access

params._activity: name of the activity that want to update the variable value
